attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Giaus Baltar is a character from the TV show Battlestar Galactica. There are many parallels one can see in Gordon Brown and the character Giaus Baltar and they obviously have the same initials. Anyway, anyone who knows BSG will know what I mean, so let's be having your votes. Thanks.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
